name: Orbiter (itch) (tducasse)
description:
You're an alien, you crashed on earth, and the human military obviously confiscated your spaceship.

Stay hidden to avoid the guards, and retrieve all the pieces to rebuild your ship and go back home.

Game made in about 5 days for the Godot Wild Jam #34, theme "space".

Controls

Just move with the arrow keys or WASD.

Music

In-game music by H36 Prod.

Menu music by myself, with Bosca Ceoil.

Art

By myself 🤣

Better in fullscreen!
